pages.text: $(l)DESCRIPTION: $(br)$()The Stellar Reaper's lethal scythe can slice through it's holder's enemies. This painful reaper is created with pure magic, casted by only the Gaugalems, who are the Stellar Reapers.
$(l)OBTAINING: $(br)$()This weapon is uncraftable as you have little to no magic capability to do so, though, Gaugalems have a little chance of dropping this item when killed.
